website_summaries.verdict: Whether you're traveling for a leisurely overnight stay or lengthy business trip, you'd have a hard time finding a garment bag with more to offer. Occasional zipper problems have been noted, but this is a common concern of bags in this class.
pros: Fits a lot of clothing and folds up neatly
some owners even use it as a carry on
Generates enthusiasm for keeping clothes crisp and wrinkle-free
Also has a few small pockets
cons: Zippers that stick, pop open, and/or break are the biggest complaints owners have about this bag

customer_reviews.title: ... sent me pics of it and said it's JUST AWESOME AND THE BEST GARMENT BAG OUT THERE - that ...
customer_reviews.text: This was on my son's Christmas list - he used it for the first time last week and even sent me pics of it and said it's JUST AWESOME AND THE BEST GARMENT BAG OUT THERE - that says a lot - he's quite the traveler. I love the fact that I got an email from the owner right after placing the order to say they want us to be 100% satisfied. I just got another text from my son - he's on another trip and just said BEST GARMENT BAG OUT THERE - THANKS MOM. :)
customer_reviews.author: navyrinemom

customer_reviews.title: A KEEPER
customer_reviews.text: This bag is unbelievable. I bought 2 as gifts for my sons for the holidays. they have used them several times since. you can fit suits, coats, shirts, shoes, and TONS of misc. items in it.. when it folds up it is still very compact. it is a great overhead bin item on the airplane. I can not say enough about this bag.. it is a also very durable and attractive. I am sad to see it is out of stock as I as going to buy one for my husband too!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: MICHAEL MCCLELLAN

customer_reviews.title: ZEGUR Carry  on Garment Bags amazing quality product!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product......bought 2 about 18 months ago. We are retired and have traveled almost weekly since I purchased 2 of these Carry On Garment Bags! Perfect in every way.....this approval is coming from a traveler who has owned Jaguar, Samsonite, American Tourister, Nicole Lee etc ..... that is the best of luggage.....if you are thinking about this bag buy it.
customer_reviews.author: sparkle

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag is awesome in every category. It looks elegant (personal taste). Highly functional and great quality. Adding to that is the customer service which is great and very helpful. They will send you a personal email to make sure the bag lived up to the expectations and assure you to fix any problems. I can't be more satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Moha79

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for travel
customer_reviews.text: Easily holds 2 dress shirts, 2 pairs of pants, 2 pairs of shoes, couple dresses for the lady and more. Worked great for a long road trip and also a few flights. Fit in the overhead compartment, even on a small plane although I had to cram it in there. There are plenty of small pockets and the main garment compartment has two straps to secure your clothes in place. I was able to iron my clothes before traveling and they arrived wrinkle-free and ready to wear. This is a great investment if you have to travel with dress clothes.
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Garment Bag.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a wedding I had to go to up north . It fit everything I needed for 5 days: Toiletries, dress shoes, and clothes. Even after my bag got smushed by some other dope's carry on in the overhead compartment of the plane, my suit came out perfectly with no wrinkles. You can definitely fit 3 suits in this garment bag. I would recommend always using the suit sleeve that comes with most good suits as it offers an extra layer of protection against wrinkling. Otherwise you may have to do some small ironing work when you get to your hotel. Other than that, the bag performed very well.
customer_reviews.author: Shin

customer_reviews.title: Zegur 40-inch 3 suit carry on. Beautiful buying experience and superior seller service
customer_reviews.text: The very best travel garment bag I have ever purchased. You cannot argue with the price....its so much below the actual value of this bag. This is everything promised plus more. A truly great purchase. I have three suits inside already plus pockets I haven't used yet. The quality of the material used in the garment bag is extraordinary. Overall construction and material is a 6-star. The manufacturer has contacted me multiple times to ensure I am totally satisfied with the product. This is one of my best buying experiences on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: john gowen

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Product
customer_reviews.text: One of the worst purchases I have made on Amazon. After 4 one-day trips within a month the zippers completing fell apart and would not longer zip up. I would not recommend this product to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Very Cheaply Made & Ripped After One Use.
customer_reviews.text: Not very durable, cheaply made and not at all large enough for business travel. Used it once and already ripped. This is good for a college student or if you only need for a weekend getaway. Not worth the money even at $35. Sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Slider

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart after first use and couldn't return it
customer_reviews.text: Used this for the first time, one day after the return window closed. One day! It fell apart. Got it for my husband for his birthday as we had several trips coming up. The hanger tore off and one of the zippered compartments broke. Complete and total waste of money. If you buy one, make sure to use it within the return window so you don't get stuck like we did. I told him this morning that Amazon was great about returns and we could return it and get him another brand. We could have...yesterday,
customer_reviews.author: TWKar

customer_reviews.title: Low quality. Zipper broke and suits were exposed during travels.
customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke on first use. Not a quality product. There are better options available.
customer_reviews.author: Cityhall89

customer_reviews.title: Probably would have except the build quality is so poor it ripped on my first use
customer_reviews.text: I regularly travel with suits for work and I was hoping this would make my life easier. Probably would have except the build quality is so poor it ripped on my first use. It's outside of the return window so I'm just stuck with it now.
customer_reviews.author: David Woolf

customer_reviews.title: The bag worked out wonderfully, held two suits and three shirts with ease
customer_reviews.text: The bag worked out wonderfully, held two suits and three shirts with ease. Was the perfect size and not overly bulky when maneuvering around the airports. When I got to my hotel destination and opened up the bag, I was pleasantly surprised of the wrinkle free condition of my garments. I would highly recommend this product due to its fabulously price point, durable construction and that it will get your garment from A to B safety and wrinkle free
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: these bags are NOT worth the money they charge . the bottom is not sewn shut and you're cloth s will hang out the bottom very cheaply made , just because something cost more doesn't make it better i fiound that out the hard way .
customer_reviews.author: richard cranium

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I was embarrassed. The travel bag zipper broke after only one use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken Bag After First Use
customer_reviews.text: The bag broke after my first use. Unfortunately, my return period was already up when this happened so I now do not see the option to return. I will refrain from further review until reached out to and remove this post if I am compensated accordingly. I have posted pictures of the broken straps revealing the bag is no longer usable. Please reach out to me and thank you for your consideration
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, didn't hold up after one use
customer_reviews.text: When I first opened this bag I was so impressed with all the different features and pockets. Design is Very well done. HOWEVER, unfortunately the carrying strap has already busted clean off. If this bag had design AND quality, it would have gotten five stars and a raving review. But a bag without a working strap to hold it is useless and frustrating when you're stuck in an airport with no other options.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Rae

customer_reviews.title: Best carry on I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is a real treasure. It has so many pockets, it is well made & can hang up a few sets of clothes. The only carry on you will need to take a small trip. The zippers & material are quality items. There are 4 huge pockets to put your underwear, socks, shoes, hats, etc. The best part was a surprise for me. It can be attached, by a sleeve on the back, to the pull handle on my other suitcase. That makes it easy for rolling together.
customer_reviews.author: Estelle Hasert

customer_reviews.title: I may need to get one of these for myself!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for her birthday to take on a cruise to put her dresses in. I personally own a garment bag that I paid 5 times more for and I like hers better!!!! It is just the perfect size, it has a strap to attach it to your rolling luggage and it has lots of compartments. It also has a strap that you can attach to it to carry it on your shoulder. It is just the right size to carry on as well since she doesn't like to check her luggage. It is made very well and the zippers work great. Great find!
customer_reviews.author: Zuska Miller

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Garment Bag
customer_reviews.text: Wow - just received this garment bag today! Very impressed. Quality is excellent and it’s large enough to hold 3 suits plus shirts etc. has strap to carry it over your shoulder or carry it like a suitcase. In addition it has a strap on one side to go over the handle bar of a carry-on suitcase. Zippers are top quality. But the best part is that this bag is guaranteed for 5 years. 05/10/2019 - Just an update - just came back from Vermont where I used this bag on my entire trip. I am still very happy and impressed with this bag and still highly recommend it to all.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Huwyler

customer_reviews.title: I can tell you this bag worked out just fine for me
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from a trip using this garment bag. I can tell you this bag worked out just fine for me. I stuffed it to the max. 3 full suits, i sport jacket, 3 shirts, ties and 2 belts. No problems closing it. Keep in mind it probably won't hold as much if I used my big wooden hangers. I used my flat velvet hangers I got at Bed, Bath & Beyond. Worked out just fine. Perfect length for suits. I didn't see any stress on the zippers when closed. I am planning on getting another one for my wife. Hope this is a help to you all. Happy travels.
customer_reviews.author: G. Duffy

customer_reviews.title: Really a great bag for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a handy bag for the money. I have travelled a few dozen times with this bag and have had no ripping, tearing, or zipper issues. The "wrinkle free" part is a little bit of a stretch, though it does seem to limit the amount of wrinkles. This bag is a bit on the bulkier side if you normally just need a couple of items but being I normally travel for longer periods of time this holds quite a few items and is easy to just hang up when you get where you are going. There are a ton of extra little compartments. I would recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: JR

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for the Traveling Man
customer_reviews.text: My brother is a jazz musician who travels all over the country year-round and wears suits when he plays. He has a nice suitcase with suit capacity where you can hang and strap the pieces in. I gave this to him for his birthday so when he takes shorter trips or plans to change when he arrives he can do so without lugging entire suitcases or merely hanging his shirt and jacket in the window of his car while he drives. He was very happy when he opened this luggage and is excited to use it. I imagine he will try it out soon and I will gladly update this review after he tells me what he thinks.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki DeLancey

customer_reviews.title: Too big & bulky
customer_reviews.text: Too big & too bulky. Carrying strap is too thin and flimsy for the bulk & weight of the bag. My husband gave it many tries. I wish I could return it but the window has closed.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Nice Travel Foldover
customer_reviews.text: This bag worked well enough keeping our clothes relatively wrinkle free. When hanging the clothes in the bag by inserting the hanger into the top, they hang too low, stick out the bottom, must be folded up, and thus somewhat defeating the purpose of the bag. The bags don't come with hangers and you must provide your own which as stated above don't work too well. Not sure how to fix this other than the manufacturer provide two or three hangers with the bag that have much shorter shanks or lengthen the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Ml Morneau

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: This bag is terrible, the first trip the zipper broke on me. The second trip the straps broke on me . I just wanted to make it home to return it, before my flight landed the second zipper broke before they could put my bag on the plane causing all my items to go everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Anna Bacon

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my husband who was traveling out of the country for a friend's wedding. I was able to fit his suit, dress shoes and a couple of other dress shirts just fine. He also used it as his carry on and used one of the pockets to store his glasses, portable charger, headphones, and travel documents. Once at his destination he did not have to worry about ironing. Not sure how useful it would be for a dress because I did not travel but once I do, I will update the review.
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for travel
customer_reviews.text: This served our purposes very well. Upon initial opening from the plastic covering, there was a strong "fishy" odor. We let it air our for the night before our flight and the odor did not appear to transfer to our clothing. The garment bag is very light before being packed with clothing. We stored a full suit as well as a formal dress in the interior. The outer pockets provided lots of additional storage. We were able to hang this up in our hotel room once we arrived. We took this on as a "carry on" on the flight and it fit in the overheard compartment with no issues. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: stella

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag
customer_reviews.text: I've traveled for years (work and pleasure) and have been through a few garment bags. This one is one of the best designed bags of all I've owned. There are plenty of pockets to hold various travel items and most importantly, there's plenty of room for hangered garments. It is very easy to pack and unpack and unlike some others, there's hook to hang the entire bag. I just started using this one and if it holds up well (they all wear out eventually), I'll buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Doc Bob

customer_reviews.title: Broke on first trip and customer service never sent repair despite promising twice
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this bag and was encouraged by the reviews. On my first trip with my bag the strap clip broke which was disappointing since I had just bought the bag and had minimal clothing in my bag. I emailed the customer service twice and each time they stated they would send a new strap. It has been many weeks since these initial messages without a new strap clip. Poor customer service and low quality product. Update: After several messages and about two months, I got a replacement strap mailed to me for free. I appreciate the free strap. Increased my review to four stars from the original one.
customer_reviews.author: Minnesota Merlin

customer_reviews.title: “Strong Bad Oder”
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this to use for going to the gym before work. I have to dress up so I needed more than gym bag. I am hoping this is going to work. Right know it’s airing out as it has a very bad oder. I would not want to put my clothes in it for fear I would smell like this all day. It’s not a good smell it was wrapped in plastic inside a box. More after this weekend. Gym will start Monday morning.
customer_reviews.author: Yoga4life

customer_reviews.title: I'm thoroughly impressed
customer_reviews.text: Bag arrived on time and in good shape. The bag has a solid feel yet is lightweight with several compartments to store shoes and/or accessories. I was able to pack 2 complete suits, 2 extra pairs of pants, shoes, 2 shirts, socks, underwear and some toiletries and there was still room. Smart design includes a shoulder strap, separate zipper compartments, 2 strap tie-downs and a tie-down bar, and a hook to allow the bag to hang vertically. I see that some other reviews have mentioned an odor, but the bag I received had no smell at all.
customer_reviews.author: Shepherd

customer_reviews.title: A Wedding Essential
customer_reviews.text: So I seldom write reviews because nothing impresses me about most items I get but this particular one is far and above expectations so deserves one. Fellow brides, yes this will hold your wedding gown and much more. It could have easily held most if not all of our clothes if we wanted PLUS my dress and his suit, AND my bouquet and it didn't get smooshed! Elopement/eloper folks, TOTALLY worth a wedding purchase. Can't say enough good things about the size, craftsmanship (it held up to a LOT of extra smoosh and still had room) and just general style and look of this product. Five stars all around.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Hedges

customer_reviews.title: At first I loved this garment bag
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved this garment bag. After one day of use one of the main zippers broke. I’m giving it 3.5 stars because the company gave me a refund and let me keep the bag. I couldn’t replace the zipper so I put a paper clip on it. The other zipper is coming out of the teen and won’t smoothly zip either way. I love all the pockets inside. I bought it for a business trip and I suppose it served its purpose. It’s lightweight and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Holds a ton!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a trip from Virginia to California. The reason was my son’s wedding. We packed all of our formal wear in this garment bag so we could carry it on the plane and not worry about lost luggage. It held 2 suits, 3 dresses and all the shoes, purses, jewelry and other little things we needed. Absolutely Perfect. Loved all the pockets and everything was secure. Perfect bag at a great price. Buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Minimom

customer_reviews.title: Great garment bag.
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for my needs. I took two suits across country along with some other stuff like t-shirts and socks. My shoes did not fit into the pockets, but had I needed to, they could have easily been zipped into the main compartment. Everything arrived in very good shape. As advertised, it is sized to be a carry-on, and it is made of what appears to be very durable material. The shoulder strap is not adjustable, but really, who cares. Overall a quality garment bag. Very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: shopuntilidrop

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price. Holds more than you think.
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these for a 16 day cruise. I managed to fit 6 suits and 3 shirts in it no problem. I could have gotten more in it! My wife got 9 dresses in hers. I like how they close and hold things in place. The one complaint was that, on the way out, when we got to the ship, the zipper on mine was open a bit and my shaving kit was gone. I don't know if the zipper popped open or someone did it on purpose. We had no issues with it on the way home. I would recommend this bag overall.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Jamison

customer_reviews.title: Nice Garment Bag!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful piece, made very well and perfect for a 2 day trip maybe 3. Has a lot of compartments for various things, easily stored in an overhead bin on the plane. I would absolutely recommend this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Scarlette

customer_reviews.title: Actor approved
customer_reviews.text: I use this on set and every one checking in around me always asks where I got it and for how much. It is great for set because I am able to pack it with the appropriate amount of clothes I would need, plus the front pocket is great for my supplies that I would need throughout the day. There's Velcro straps in the front pocket so your phone and charger dont fly around, and another so your laptop stays put too. Its incredibly durable and the strap is adjustable for all sizes
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Shoulder strap broke on second use
customer_reviews.text: I love the pockets and design of this bag, but like others have posted, the strap came completely off while putting it on my shoulder after only its second trip. Luckily it was coming home after the return flight! EDIT: They reached out and sent a new bag, which seems to be fine after a couple of trips. Hopefully it lasts! Thanks for making things right.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Pakrul (stephthegeek)

customer_reviews.title: Packs 2+ days of clothes for a big guy.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t speak for durability yet, but will update when I get a feel for that. I purchased this for an upcoming trip as I hate packing dress clothes in a suitcase and have them wrinkled. I’m a big guy, big, and I was able to pack a sport coat, two pair of slacks, two pair of dress shirts, two pair of underwear, two pair of socks, and two undershirts with room to spare. Folded up nicely on itself without issue. I’m impressed. If this thing holds up to traveling, which I’m sure it will because it will be carried on all the time, I’ll be a customer for life.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but not convenient for traveling
customer_reviews.text: It's well made and there's a lot of space, but the shape and size are not convenient for traveling. On my last flight, the carry-on compartment was full and putting this under the seat is impossible without making it into a ball, so you loose the whole purpose of having this bag in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Cottle

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need in a travel bag.
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my honor guard uniform. First and only complaint is the zipper inside the bag. Inner flap/ cover. It just seems a little flimsy and hard to get started. But it has failed yet. The bag has plenty of storage pockets for all my extras. Built in hook to hold the bag up is a huge plus, you don't have to rely on your hangers to hold everything up. The bag and my uniform travel well and with the should strap keeps my hands free to carry other things.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Terrible purchase
customer_reviews.text: I left it in the car when I got it and tried to use it for the first time today but the bag has melted and the handle to carry it is broken. I’ve used it zero times so far. DO NOT BUY THIS. I CANT BELIEVE HOW MUCH MONEY I WASTED. THERE ARE OTHER BAGS OUT THERE. THE QUALITY OF THIS ONE IS SUBOPTIMAL there is supposed to be a warranty on the bag. when you go to the website they suggest- it doesn't exist! IT'S A TRAP. DO NOT BUY THIS BAG. IT'S NOT A LEGIT COMPANY. ZEGUR.COM IS NOT A WEBSITE.
customer_reviews.author: Megha

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag and a second larger bag from another company with the intention of checking both bags out and returning one of them after I saw their size, quality, etc. This bag is smaller than the other one I ordered but since it is so well made, will be great for shorter trips and for when I am traveling alone, I decided to keep both bags. This one will be great for when I do not want to check a bag. Thanks to the seller for their commitment to customer service, it is refreshing!
customer_reviews.author: Farmgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a 1 to 3 day trip with multiple suits, shirts, etc. One nice thing is my size 13 dress shoes fit in the pocket which was a pleasant surprise. Looks professional and is a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Charles F Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for an overnight trip
customer_reviews.text: Just back from an overnight, the suit and shirt I packed locked great when I got to hotel 12 hours after packing. I left jacket in dry clean plastic. Initially concerned that it stays folded/closed when zipped (my other garment bags could hang 'long' in a car once you got to destination). But suit and shirt had no wrinkles. Light weight, shoulder strap works well. I also had toiletries, running shoes/clothes, all fit well. It fit in overhead of CRJ200 jet, but I had to push a bit. This was on the way home, so might see some wrinkles if I did it on the way out.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great carry on bag for garments
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and roomy. A pocket for everything. The only con is if you don't fold it in half and use it as a hanging garment bag your clothes are not protected at the bottom. The inside has a zippered flap area for your clothes (and a great protective bar in the middle), but the bottom is open and my dress hung out. The only way to protect the bottom of your clothes is to fold it in half and zip it up. If the inside flap had a zipper on the bottom I would have given the bag a 5+++ rating. It is a fantastic carry on bag, but not as great for a hanging bag in your car.
customer_reviews.author: emily m.

customer_reviews.title: Wedding clothes carry on
customer_reviews.text: Used to travel to my destination wedding. I had a one piece women’s pantsuit- I had to fold in half to fit as was too long to just hang. However it still worked out great as it secures clothing nicely. I hung clothes once there and had no wrinkle issues. Good side pockets that were essential since I used this as my only airplane carry in. Price was a little higher than some other I looked at, but pleased with quality of item.
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Great Garment Bag - Would Recommend
customer_reviews.text: The Zegur 40" did a great job managing my suits during a recent international trip. Although designed for 3, I was able to fit 5 suit jackets (on suit hangers) and still zip it closed. I like the internal cover / lining which still covers the suits when unfolded for hanging. There are three retention straps that help hold everything in place as well. Because I was exceeding the recommended capacity of the garment bag, everything else was packed in a large suitcase. Overall, I'm very pleased with the product. It made it from Dallas to Paris and held up very nicely and my jackets looked great!
customer_reviews.author: Tom L.

customer_reviews.title: Quiet happy and pleasantly pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with build quality and functionality of design. All seams well sewn and zippers working smoothly and freely. First true test will be tomorrow as on the road for remainder of the month. Update Just returned from a trip halfway across the country. Atlanta to Denver, couple of plane changes and enough shirts, pants and a suit for 5 days. Amazed at how much the bag holds, how easy the zippers glide and the design. Suit and pants came out wrinkle free and the dress shirts only needed a quick touch up. Well worth the money paid!
customer_reviews.author: Randal

customer_reviews.title: All-in-one for short trips
customer_reviews.text: This bag has a simple but elegant design that enhances its functionality os the only bag you will need for 1-2 nights travel. I can carry the clothes I need (mostly wrinkle-free), as well as an iPad and/or laptop, along with a couple of small paper files. The bag seems to be made from a very durable fabric, and it just looks good. The only thing I would change is to use a sturdier zipper, although mine has had no problems so I won't deduct a star for that.
customer_reviews.author: Dean

customer_reviews.title: Worked very well
customer_reviews.text: This bag did excellently at keeping my two suits wrinkle-free on a trip from North American to Australia for a wedding. The additional storage pockets were roomier than I'd anticipated, and the whole thing was easy to use. What I cannot speak to is long-term durability since I have only the one experience so far, but it certainly performed perfectly on this trip.
customer_reviews.author: megamiddlemyth

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and nicely  fit more than I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I was so happy to get this garment on time. It nicely fit my long dress, my grandson’s kilt, my husband’s suit and my daughter’s dressy suit. Everything was in good shape after flying cross country. The extra compartments came in handy as well. The quality of the garment bag was excellent. Another plus is that it fit in the overhead compartment on the plane and we save money on not having to check the bag in.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Great garment bag for me!
customer_reviews.text: This Zegur carry on garment bag was the perfect bag for me on my trip to my daughters wedding. I flew from FL to CAL, with my suit, shirt, tie, and shoes in this bag with no problems. It stowed nicely under the seat in front of me. The bag kept everything nice and no wrinkles!! There was room for more garments and other accessories, too! I really appreciated the Velcro strap on the back of the bag to secure it to the pull handle of my carry on suitcase. It helped to keep my bags together.
customer_reviews.author: James  L

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: We used this case on a trip to Scotland (from Oregon). One plane change, multiple taxi drivers and bell hops: the case came through like a trooper. Very spacious: two dresses, one three-piece suit, a wool kilt, a silk skirt and a pair of shoes. Also, a spare pair of pants in the outside pocket. With all this it didn't feel "stuffed." Very pleased with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: T. Simpson

customer_reviews.title: Great product for very reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping -- and the product meets our expectations so far --we will be using this to transport my husbands suit to our son's wedding in California (from Ohio) in a few weeks . We are impressed with this product - appears to be well made and constructed. Read several reviews and looked at several garment bags before deciding to give this one a try since it came highly recommended and had great reviews. States its a carry on - so hopefully this is true and we don't have issues with the airline. Great product for the price. thanks
customer_reviews.author: cocochanel.

customer_reviews.title: Half the price, twice as nice
customer_reviews.text: This bag is easily the quality of products that are twice as expensive. There are numerous pockets and cubbies inside and out. You can separate socks, ties, undergarments, accessories, shoes, etc. and will STILL have extra room. The garment carrying feature of the bag itself is well designed with two loops made of webbing staggered for hooking on hangers. A few padded straps buckle into place for keeping everything in place, and a fabric barrier with pockets and cubbies zips over that. There is a metal hook on chain that allows you to hang the bag from a rack while unzipped, a nice feature. Stop your search here if you’re looking for a garment bag. Highly recommended for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My suits were very well protected.
customer_reviews.text: So I got a new job where I have to dress in suits when I travel. I went to 6 stores and did not find a garment bag I could carry on the plane. I only found one store With a check on garment bag. I’m not checking my suits in to be destroyed! This bag did so well. My suits were wrinkle free. The bag is easy to pack and carry. Shoes fit in the pockets. I’m very happy I found this. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: maddog24

customer_reviews.title: Wrinkle free suit travel
customer_reviews.text: Finally had chance to fly with this bag. Fit in overhead no problem, I packed one suit, couple of shirts, ties, socks and no wrinkles or any issues. Also, I decided to leave my briefcase home, have a bad back that I did not want to stress further. This overnight bag has a large front pocket with many compartments to hold my phone, IPad, charge cords and sales material I need to carry with me. I have a Tumi bag that I paid 10x more for, this bag is better at wrinkle free suit travel. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Rfiveh

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am 6', 300lbs and wear a size 56 jacket. This bag performed well for a long weekend and was stuffed with 1 tuxedo (bagged), 1 sport coat, 2 dress slacks, 4 shirts, underwear, socks, formal shoes a shaving kit and had room left over for the small stuff (braces, belt, phone charger, iPad @ portfolio). Besides a change of clothing, the trip home was just as uneventful. The only SMALL changes I would consider is metal swivel hooks and a thicker pad on the shoulder strap. The don't match the quality of the bag. Both being a bit wimpy. I'll update this post after my next trip if anything changes.
customer_reviews.author: John McDougall

customer_reviews.title: Very Poor Quality Item
customer_reviews.text: This garment bag could have been something with great potential, but instead it is poorly crafted due to its low-budget zippers. I took a trip to Utah and all the zippers gave me massive problems. Two completely broke off in my hands. Save your money folks...
customer_reviews.author: Afrikan Magic

customer_reviews.title: Very good value for price
customer_reviews.text: 2 suits, a heavy sport coat, 2 shirts and 2 pairs casual slacks fit well - the shirts wrinkled. Very good value for the price. I am not certain about durability as the main zipper separated w the bulk of the load but it is self healing and currently fine. A heavier zipper and I would give this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Franklin Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Companion
customer_reviews.text: Just used the ZEGUR suit carry-on garment bag for the first time on a short 3 day business trip. It worked great and just as advertised. A few things I love about it: The storage pockets on the inside that allow you to store ties, shoes,, belts or other stuff; Comes with a shoulder strap and a fixed strap which allow you to attach it to your rolling suitcase; the inside straps which keeps everything together. Great buy for the price and I would certainly recommend it to anyone who travels and needs to take along their work suits.
customer_reviews.author: T. Songer III

customer_reviews.title: Nasty odor
customer_reviews.text: This looked as though it was made well enough but it had a horrible odor right out of the package. I hung it up in my spare bedroom for several days thinking the smell would dissipate but it did not. I tried reading in that room one evening and had to move the bag out because the smell was so obnoxious. No way would I put my husband's suit and my dress in it for my daughter's wedding out of state.
customer_reviews.author: E. Staverman

customer_reviews.title: Convenient, Compact, Crinkle-free
customer_reviews.text: best travel bag i’ve ever owned. the bag is flat and takes up minimal space yet you are able to pack the bag full of clothes! plenty of room for a 3-day weekend trip. It fits great in the truck of a car for a road trip or in the overhead compartment on an airplane. my significant other was so jealous, we had to order another!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Light weight. Cheap zippers.
customer_reviews.text: The bag was great to start. I took it on a few trips and it was a great bag to haul suits and ironed shirts on planes. It fit nicely on the overhead compartments and I was even able to check the bag on a southwest flight when I didn't feel like carrying it. It is light weight and comfortable to carry with a shoulder strap. So why the two stars? The zipper of the large back pocket broke and I'm no longer able to close it. I have had it for less then a year and I already can't use the largest pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan B.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product!
customer_reviews.text: The Garment Bag functioned as advertised. It was lightweight and durable. I traveled overseas with several required pieces of clothing that I valued. After multiple connections and one long layover, I arrived at my destination with clothes that were not wrinkled. My dress shirts, sport coats, and pants were in pristine condition.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wiggins

customer_reviews.title: Great garment bag
customer_reviews.text: Really like this garment bag. I had several interviews cross country and this thing was a life saver. I took this bag and another standard carry on luggage and had no problems at the US airports. This garment bag counts as a personal item as long as you can fit it in front of your legroom on the planes. The material and the sowing is starting to come off a bit, but nothing major. Overall for this price, I would buy again if I ever needed another one.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Botero

customer_reviews.title: I haven't used it yet but it was impressive right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: The zippers are nice. The pockets and all of the features for stowing stuff other than your suit are great. I will definitely find this bag useful while traveling/commuting. I've barely reviewed anything on Amazon before - and I've been a prime member since 2011 - but this bag genuinely impressed me. I purchased a $25 bag a year ago and I have to say I feel stupid for not just investing in this one from the start. I will update this after using the bag for some time. If I find flaws I'll revise but I am confident that I won't have to do that.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bag!!!!
customer_reviews.text: A very nice garment bag that at first I was a little worried that it would not fit in my overhead compartment on my flight but it turned out to fit extremely well. I packed a tuxedo as well as two other sets of dress clothes and the bag closed very easily. The bag had many other storage compartments that it made it practically impossible for me not to pack the other items needed for the clothing in the bag. I am very happy with my purchase and I see that this will get plenty of use out of me.
customer_reviews.author: feli

customer_reviews.title: The bag has lots of compartments.
customer_reviews.text: The bag has lots of compartments, and seems durable. This is the 2nd one, the first was returned for a rip at the seam after one flight. I think it was probably more a defect. I bought this for my son in college. The only problem I have with the bag, is the "Zegur" tag that came with the bag claiming 100% satisfaction, the website does not exist. I'll hold further reviews until next flight. The vendor was terrific.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I don't travel much especially with dresses/suits, so this will work great for me. I gave it 4 stars after using it for a week. The fabric on the outside is much nicer than what they use on the inside. When they say 3 suit & dress they are not kidding! So just keep in mind if there is more than one person using it you may need one each. Thankfully the shop we had gotten my husbands suits from had supplied him with a garment bag (free of charge) he commented it was funny that the one we got from them was about the same quality as this one that I bought and paid for.
customer_reviews.author: K. Ward

customer_reviews.title: NOT A CARRY ON
customer_reviews.text: So this bag is cool for what it is. Nice of space and cool accessories to make traveling with a suit a breeze. However this bag is 100% not a carry on and will not fit in the overhead bin on commuter flights. Despite how this is listed it is definitely not a carry on.
customer_reviews.author: GoPack989

customer_reviews.title: Lots of space, great value.
customer_reviews.text: I picked this up on a whim as I was traveling to a wedding and needed something to transport my suit, a few shirts and a wedding dress without wrinkling it. I thought this worked out really well for my needs. The construction seems solid and i could probably get 2-3 suits in here if I needed to. The pockets are helpful for storing shoes and ties as well. Lastly, in the folded position this fit nicely in the overhead compartment for my flight.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality bag
customer_reviews.text: I am very satisfied with the purchase of this suite travel bag. It is well made and has a very sturdy metal hook and chain to suspend the bag when in the closet. It did smell very strange but in no way affects its functionality. The customer service was impeccable and reached out to me after the purchase to assure I was totally satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Frontz

customer_reviews.title: Well made, holds 3 suits and 3 shirts easily.
customer_reviews.text: Overall this garment bag performs well. I have used it to carry up to 3 suits and 3 long-sleeve dress shirts at the same time without any problem. The material seems thick and overall it feels very sturdy. The zipper is thick and strong. My suits did not come out wrinkle-free after a trip of ~5 hours, but they were definitely less wrinkled than when folded and put into luggage. I think this item is worthwhile for someone traveling often with dress clothes to which they want to minimize wrinkles.
customer_reviews.author: KingslayerMD

customer_reviews.title: Fabric has a terrible odor
customer_reviews.text: I got this for work suits and as of now it is unusable. Opened package and the entire thing smells absolutely terrible. I cant even explain the odor but my whole room smells of it. I cannot put clothes in it until I remove the odor so hopefully lysol or febreze works.
customer_reviews.author: A. Deans

customer_reviews.title: Great For A Quick Business Trip
customer_reviews.text: For the price, not worth thinking about, just buy it. I took a quick business trip from New York to Seattle. Stayed two nights and brought a suit, dress shirts, sports jacket, nice slacks, casual clothes, toiletries, and an extra pair of shoes. Was perfect. Nothing was wrinkled. Easy on and off the plane.
customer_reviews.author: Rob, Danbury, Connecticut

customer_reviews.title: First impression “impressive”
customer_reviews.text: Mind you I have not had the chance to use the garment bag yet but... first impression is that it is thoughtfully laid out and is sharp looking. The zippers operate flawlessly. Overall quality is excellent in my opinion. Look forward to packing my suit next week... unfortunately it’s for a funeral! Will update this review if the above recommendation turns out to be wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: True to their word
customer_reviews.text: Product was amazing, worked great, used for an international trip with connecting flights and held together great. Back pocket was missing zipper and came undone when I got home, leaving it unuseable. Going on same business trip this year, asked company for a discount on a new one nearly a year later and they sent a new one for free without question. Not trying to sell for them, but be honest, how many companies would do that? New one is flawless, thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Jerry H.

customer_reviews.title: It’s good
customer_reviews.text: After extensive research decided to go with this one. It’s nice and strong. Clothes aren’t wrinkle free but... hello you’re traveling!!! I don’t like it doesn’t lay completely flat the “fold” area is strange and has to be unzipped “around” a curve. Lot’s of storage areas.
customer_reviews.author: Lost in Japan

customer_reviews.title: Stay Away Unless You Want Water Damage
customer_reviews.text: My advice is to look elsewhere. Just a small amount of rain unloading my bag at the airport and this thing is soaked on the inside. Terrible quality and now my suits are soaking wet and I’m here for a week. Great job Zegur. Update: Still no word from Zegur or a response to their defective product. My advice still applies. Look elsewhere for better quality. You get what you pay for. For $45 I should’ve expected terrible quality and an inferior product, just like what Zegur sent me.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and above all practical short term business garment bag.
customer_reviews.text: A very practical item for short business trips (up to one week in duration). While it is small enough to fit in the overhead luggage bins of most airlines it is sturdy and voluminous enough to hold and protect a couple of different suits and five shirts plus a pair of shoes. It also hangs up well in your hotel closet with a sturdy hook, giving you access to the contents. No problems with it what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, compact, holds lots of clothing
customer_reviews.text: Oh my god. BUY IT!! Looked at many garment bags before purchasing this one, and have no regrets. The bag has MANY large, useful pockets and we packed it with at least 15 garments during our honeymoon with no difficulty. There are not one, but three straps in the interior to fasten over the clothing, which work wonderfully. The carrying handles and strap are so handy. It is sleek, compact, and SO practical. Look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works but quality of sewing needs to improve to double stitching
customer_reviews.text: Great for uniforms and casual suits. I was able to fit multiple sports coats, slacks and two pairs of dress shoes. Worked well as a carry on for flights. Only giving a 3 for durability because Some of the stitching is coming unraveled around the bend of the bag when zipped up. Not a lot of the stress areas are double stitched. Handle and overlay for handle is double stitched and cross stitched for carrying. But If I checked this bag it may not last very long. Other than that it works well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't Wait Forever in the TSA line - Travel Light
customer_reviews.text: This lightweight, durable bag is perfect for a relatively brief trip. If you'e going to be gone moe than a few days, you'll need additonal luggage. Ir is big enough to hold a suit, shirt, underwear, and basic toiletries. Eperienced travelers know that many items can be purchased at the destination, so they avoid hassles at the TSA lines by bringing only the most essential items along. Useful accessories include shoe bags and for men, a tie case.
customer_reviews.author: Lange Winckler

customer_reviews.title: A Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: This was a good purchase. It held my suit, my overcoat, and my wife's dress just fine on a flight from coast to coast. We checked the bag and everything was protected; the clothing was held in place by the straps inside the garment bag. We had to fold the dress, but it did not effect its travel at all. This bag It feels well made, although I had a little difficulty with the small zipper that protects the clothes on the inside. The outer zippers are easy to manage and the bag is sturdy. It would have fit in the overhead compartments, but we exceeded our carry on threshold.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Jolly

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag Great Price
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these garment bags and they look well made, I won't use them until the middle of Dec. but I don't anticipate having any issues. The bag is well made and has quite a few little amenities. The price is EXCELLENT it sure beats the big brands and it looks to be just as well made.
customer_reviews.author: A. Holloway

customer_reviews.title: Review of ZEGUR Garment Bag
customer_reviews.text: I bought the ZEGUR garment bag in a hurry and was truly satisfied with it. I was able to carry all that was needed for a four day trip without requiring any additional carry bags. One additional piece that would make a great attachment is the ability to hook up wheels to make it a pulley in case carrying becomes too strenuous for some people.
customer_reviews.author: VinnyO

customer_reviews.title: Broken zipper after 4 months.......  :'-(
customer_reviews.text: Just over 4 months old and the zipper already broke! Very disappointed, as this bag has only been on one trip by air. Other than that, it travels in a car with me. So it's never abused. Of course it can no longer be returned, so it's extremely unfortunate that this has happened. Other than the broken zipper, the bag is awesome. I like the construction and the storage space. It's way better than a simple suit bag. I can use just this one bag for short trips. Not sure I'll bother getting another of these, though, too disappointed. I'd easily give this 5 stars, had this not happened. Especially after the return period.
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: A great garment bag
customer_reviews.text: I travel for work and this is a must have! I keep almost ALL of my clothes for a 5 day business trip in this, including pajamas, socks and underwear. It has a pocket that fits pens, 1" binders etc. This fits easily in the overhead compartment and has a strap to attach to a telescoping handle on a rollie suitcase (because it does get heavy!). My rollie hold my toiletries, makeup, hair products and miscellaneous odds and ends.
customer_reviews.author: RagdollKomsGrooming

customer_reviews.title: Very nice looking and well made
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for our son in law. He will be doing a lot of traveling this next year and requested a garment bag for Christmas. Found many good reviews, so decided to purchase. Looks well made. I like the fact that it comes with a hook for hanging and a shoulder strap. Try to come back and add additional comments after he uses it.
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I am a contract archaeologist and spend a lot of time on the road. I use this bag to keep ALL of my weeks clothes ready to grab and go at a moments notice. Lots of room, pockets, and dividers to keep stuff organized. Well made and very handy if you travel a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! Used it last week with 2 suits
customer_reviews.text: Great bag! Used it last week with 2 suits, a dress, and multiple dress shirts. Worked great and seems very durable. The only negative is that the strap to velcro to the handle of another bag is too high up so it doesn't get a positive grip on my luggage set. I didn't even take a star off because I'm sure there's variance in handle heights and I was able to get by just fine by holding both handles together as it's a very small misalignment.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: The bag is fine, but despite all of the reviews saying people ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag is fine, but despite all of the reviews saying people were able to carry this onto an airplane, my husband was not able to carry it onto a Delta flight from Cincy to Vegas. They said it was too big.
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Price & Style
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality, Price & Style - I have been searching for a garment bag for quiet some time now. I was very skeptical ordering something like this on line. After running in and out of stores with no luck. I went on line and there it was just what I was searching for! ZEGUR Suit Travel Carry on. I am so pleased with the superior quality of this product, I will order again form this company.
customer_reviews.author: Deb

customer_reviews.title: General experience of this garment bag:
customer_reviews.text: The bag feels really sturdy, has good structure and shape to it, plenty of pouches and storage spaces. In short, I'm not going to need to worry about how I'm going to transport my suit to a wedding anytime soon. To hold the suit, this bag has two adjustable normal straps, and one foam cylinder strap at the fold of the bag to prevent creasing. There are internal loops for 3 hangers at the top (pants, shirt, and jacket). It gets zipped up behind the side panels to keep everything secure for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Worked once, then zipper broke
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for my travel to overseas. Carried my suits. Always kept it inside cabin as a carry on. Zipper broke on my way back from Toronto after my first travel with very light use. I do not recommend this item. Edit August 4th: They contacted me and sent a replacement one free of charge. will give another try in my upcoming trips.
customer_reviews.author: Payam J.

customer_reviews.title: outside pouch was nice and the bag was of good quality
customer_reviews.text: It was a decent bag, but there is no way you're fitting a pair of shoes in one pouch. All of the inside pockets were small. outside pouch was nice and the bag was of good quality. I would have given it four stars but they charged me $8 to send it back. So much for that 100% satisfaction guarantee.
customer_reviews.author: J. Moore

product_meta.title: ZEGUR Suit Carry On Garment Bag for Travel & Business Trips With Shoulder Strap (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

Why is the Zegur Carry On Garment Bag the Best-Selling Garment Bag on Amazon?

Why is it a Must-Have for Business Trips or Weekend Getaways?

Traveling Is Supposed to Be Fun, Who Wants to Waste Time Ironing?

Whether it’s for business or pleasure, we all love taking the opportunity to travel and explore 
the world. But when you pack your clothing in a standard suitcase, you arrive at your 
destination to find wrinkled shirts, creased pants and a crumpled suit.

Travel Like Never Before! Keep Clothes Clean, Neat and Wrinkle-Free with the Carry On Garment Bag by Zegur!

Thanks to an interior dual buckle, clothes arrive in perfect condition, ensuring that you look 
professional for meetings or interviews.

Measuring 23”x 22”x 4” when folded (43”x 22”x 4” when open), this incredible bag holds 
up to three suits or dresses with plenty of room left for belts, shoes, ties and toiletries. We 
even added an exterior pocket, providing easy access to electronics or travel documents.

Lightweight and Comfortable: Who Wants to Lug a Heavy Suitcase?

Our bag attaches to your luggage for portable convenience! With a top carrying handle and 
an adjustable, detachable shoulder strap, it’s versatile, great on the go and fits in all large 
overhead storage bins!

Unisex Design: The Classic Look Is Great for Men and Women!

An elegantly imprinted full interior lining shows that we’re dedicated to offering style and sophistication.

Lasts for Years: Waterproof Material Makes Our Bag Amazingly Functional!

Constructed from fray-resistant 1800D Polyester, our bag is EVA foam padded and features 
durable zippers for years of enjoyment.

It’s the Perfect Gift for Your Loved One!

Try Risk Free with Our Money Back Guarantee! Take Advantage of Our Limited Time Low Offer Price and Order Today!
feature_bullets: ✈️ MAKES YOUR TRAVEL FUN ENJOYABLE AND STRESS-FREE: Whether you’re headed for a business trip or a weekend getaway, the Zegur garment bag keeps you organized and takes the hassle out of packing! Thanks to multiple interior zipper pockets, it maximizes storage capacity, holding everything from suits, dresses to shoes and ties. For even more space, we added an exterior pocket that provides easy access to electronics and travel or business documents, so you will have a fantastic trip!

👔 KEEPS YOUR CLOTHES CLEAN, UNWRINKLED, AND SPEND TIME RELAXING, NOT IRONING: When you’re on the go, who has time to iron? Our suits bag luggage was specially designed to keep your clothes, dress clean, neat and wrinkle-free! An interior dual buckle holds your garments in place, ensuring that they don’t crease or crumple during travel, so you will have more time relaxing and less time getting ready!

🌞 LOOK GREAT AND TRAVEL IN STYLE: With a sleek, fashionable design, the Zegur garment bag luggage ensures that both men and women travel in style! It also features an adjustable and detachable shoulder strap, providing versatility and comfort. For added convenience, it fits in all large overhead bins.

✅ PREMIUM, HIGHEST QUALITY, LONG LASTING DESIGN: Our travel bag is where style meets function! High quality zippers, fray-resistant material and a waterproof exterior guarantee that you’ll use it for years to come. Constructed from rugged 1800D Polyester with an elegantly imprinted full interior lining, this is the best garment bag available today.

💗 LOVE IT OR YOUR MONEY BACK: We know you’ll love your new garment bag so much that we’re proud to offer a 100% money-back guarantee, if for any reason you’re not totally satisfied, you can return it using our full money back guarantee. There’s nothing to lose, Take advantage of a limited time low offer today!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars4,030 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
